title: 124 92 32 "The Sweat Threat""The Nightmare Draws Near! This is the Sand-Sand Clan's Secret Base!"Transliteration: "Akumu no toki semaru! Koko wa Sunasunadan himitsu kichi" (Japanese:悪夢の時迫る!ここは砂砂団秘密基地) Yuji Endo Michiru Shimada September 1, 2002(2002-09-01)[97] June 9, 2007[98][99]
transformers_text: 124 92 32 The Sweat Threat The Nightmare Draws Near This is the S and S and Clan's Secret Base Transliteration Aku mu no toki se maru Koko wa Sun a sun a dan him its u k ichi Japanese Yuji Endo Michiru Shimada September 1 2002 2002 09 01 97 June 9 2007 98 99 Luffy fights with Crocodile by using blood on his fists but Crocodile reveals that he has a poisonous hook and plans on finishing Luffy off once and for all Meanwhile Viv i finds the bomb and calls the Straw Hats together but realize that the Mr 7 team is guarding the bomb
